exposition.name: Allies
exposition.text: The Emperor's soldiers are locking down the system. You must...

enemy_fleet_appears.name: Enemies
enemy_fleet_appears.text: Surrender and you WILL be harmed!

enemy_fleet_appears.name: Allies
enemy_fleet_appears.text: Oh golly, here they come. Good luck, Rex!

enemy_fleet_defeated.name: Emperor
enemy_fleet_defeated.text: Infidels! Must I do everything myself?
